plays.text: Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Roughing Eric Weinrich
Penalty to Kip Miller 2 minutes for Tripping Justin Williams
Penalty to Jason Blake 2 minutes for Slashing Mark Recchi
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Holding Marty Murray
Penalty to Michael Peca 2 minutes for Tripping Jeremy Roenick
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Kip Miller
Penalty to John LeClair 2 minutes for Hooking Kenny Jonsson
Penalty to John LeClair 2 minutes for High Sticking Claude Lapointe
Penalty to Claude Lapointe 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jeremy Roenick 2 minutes for Interference Shawn Bates
Penalty to Dan McGillis 2 minutes for Crosschecking Mark Parrish
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for High Sticking Adrian Aucoin
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for High Sticking Adrian Aucoin
Penalty to Garth Snow 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Mark Parrish
Goal scored by Michael Peca unassisted
